content.rendered:
John is a Chartered Marine Engineer, surveyor and consultant withover 25 years in the marine industry. He is a Class 1 Chief Engineer with proven experience of project management, fleet maintenance and new construction; cruise ships, mega-yachts and refrigerated cargo ships

Contact

New York, NY | +1 917 392 0463

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Equipment failure investigation, shipbuilding and repair
Expert Witness Expertise: Arbitration
